tiffinServices.name: Maharashtrian Ghar Ka Khana
tiffinServices.description: Authentic Maharashtrian home-style cooking with fresh ingredients. Our tiffin service has been serving the Nagpur community for over 5 years with traditional recipes passed down through generations.
tiffinServices.fullAddress: Near Medical College, Plot No. 45, Dharampeth, Nagpur - 440010

userReviews.name: Autumn Phillips
userReviews.comment: I've been using their service for 3 months now, and the food quality is consistently great. Fresh ingredients, clear packaging, and always on time. The dal is particularly lovely and authentic. I'll definitely renew my subscription.

userReviews.name: Sharola Rhodes
userReviews.comment: Wow! I love the taste. It's like grandma and hygienic. Plus, I can track my orders and choose between lunch or dinner slots easily. Highly recommended.

userReviews.name: Patricia Sanders
userReviews.comment: I stay in a hostel and don't have time to cook - this service has been a lifesaver. The lunch is always warm and delivered on time. Customer support is also responsive.

hostels.name: Scholars Den Boys Hostel
hostels.description: A well-maintained boys hostel with all modern amenities. Located in a prime area with easy access to colleges and hospitals. Safe and secure environment with 24/7 security.
hostels.rulesAndPolicies: No smoking inside premises. Visitors allowed to 8 PM. Main closing: 7:30 AM - 10:30 PM. 7-9 PM Number breakdown in common areas.

userReviews.name: Autumn Phillips
userReviews.comment: I stayed for 2 weeks—home away comfort, Wi-Fi was responsive, and Wi-Fi was fast. Highly recommend for students!

userReviews.name: Rhonda Rhodes
userReviews.comment: Budget-friendly with 24/7 security. Shared kitchen was a plus. Minor plumbing issue, but it was fixed quickly.

userReviews.name: Patricia Sanders
userReviews.comment: A cozy living space in Dharampeth. Lots of food options nearby and peaceful environment for studying.
